CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Online relative to EchoWave?
SRP.A: Starburst Online is {above} EchoWave in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing CrimsonLink relative to OracleFeed?
SRP.A: CrimsonLink is {below} OracleFeed in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing NovaStream relative to Luminara?
SRP.A: NovaStream is {below} Luminara in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starburst Online}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {AetherNet}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst Online's minimum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst Online's minimum Platform Traffic is in {2010}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is OracleFeed's maximum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: OracleFeed's maximum Platform Traffic is in {2013}.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2016, did the total Platform Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 2009 and 2013?
NC.A: The change in total platform traffic between 2007 and 2016 was {larger} than between 2009 and 2013.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2010, did the total Platform Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total platform traffic between 2008 and 2010 was {smaller} than between 2006 and 2010.

NC.Q: Was the total Platform Traffic in 2007 higher or lower than in 2018?
NC.A: The total platform traffic in 2007 was {lower} than in 2018.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2022, was the average total Platform Traffic higher or lower than between 2011 and 2022?
NC.A: The average total platform traffic between 2006 and 2022 was {lower} than between 2011 and 2022.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Starburst Online} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did CrimsonLink and NovaStream first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: CrimsonLink and NovaStream first exchanged leading positions in {2006}.
